mapper.select: SELECT bcic.id, bcic.bmi_min, bcic.bmi_max, bcic.age_min, bcic.age_max, bcic.org_leve_id, bcic.tz_leve_id, bcic.rout, bcic.check_item_id, bcic.check_type FROM bmi_check_item_config bcic WHERE bcic.age_min <= ${age} AND bcic.age_max >= ${age} AND bcic.bmi_min <= ${bmi} AND bcic.bmi_max >= ${bmi} AND bcic.check_type = ${check_type} AND bcic.check_item_id = ${check_item_id} ORDER BY bcic.id DESC LIMIT 1
